# serialize(to:)

**Instance Method**

Writes the contents of the archive to a file.

## Declaration

```swift
func serialize(to url: URL) throws
```

## Parameters

- **url**: The URL for the destination file.

## Discussion

The destination folder needs to exist when you call this method.
title: serialize(to:)
